history.content: Feel free to contact me directly.  Since you posted this anonymously, it is impossible for me to fact check any of your assertions about your own personal situation (including where you are currently on the waitlist). As to whether telebears updates at midnight or 7am, I'm not certain.

I am an undeclared student who intends to minor in Computer Science, and am currently on the waitlist for CS 188.

Over the past couple days, I've tracked my position on the waitlist, as well as the number enrolled in the class, and the number of people on the waitlist.

On Friday (1/22), I was #23 on the waitlist, with 650/650 enrolled in the class, and 87/100 people on the waitlist.

On Saturday (1/23), I was #19 on the waitlist, with 638/650 enrolled in the class, and 85/100 people on the waitlist.

On Sunday (1/24), I was #19 on the waitlist, with 650/650 enrolled in the class, and 80/100 people on the waitlist.

Today (Monday, 1/25), I am still #19 on the waitlist, with 648/650 enrolled in the class, and 80/100 people on the waitlist.

Given that the number enrolled in the class has decreased and then increased to capacity over the past few days, and according to the EECS policies, "Once Phase II is over (i.e. mid-August and mid-January for Fall and Spring semesters; also see the Tele-BEARS Calendar/Schedule), during open enrollment, any UC student will be enrolled starting from the beginning of the existing waitlist. Neither major status nor class standing will impact enrollment at this point," I was expecting my position on the waitlist to improve. But it hasn't.

So my questions are: Is Telebears actually updated over the weekend? Is Telebears glitching out? Am I being paranoid about this, and my position on the waitlist is actually better than it seems? Is Telebears updated daily? If so, does it update at midnight, or 7am?

And my low-key conspiracy question: Is the waitlist actually processed in order? Because Telebears says the waitlist will be processed manually by the department, whereas I would think the waitlist would be processed automatically. Also, the number of people on the waitlist is decreasing while the number enrolled in the class is increasing, yet my position on the waitlist isn't improving.

Thank you for any comments and/or answers. I really appreciate it.
history.subject: CS 188 Waitlist & Telebears
